verses.verse: And <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G816>looking<s%> <S%G816>intently<s%> at the <S%G4892>Council,<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G435>"Brethren,<s%> <S%G80><s%> I have <S%G4176>lived<s%> my <S%G4176>life<s%> with a <S%G3956>perfectly<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> before <S%G2316>God<s%> up to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>"

And the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G367>Ananias<s%> <S%G2004>commanded<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3936>standing<s%> <S%G3936>beside<s%> him to <S%G5180>strike<s%> him on the <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2316>"God<s%> is <S%G3195>going<s%> to <S%G5180>strike<s%> you, you <S%G2867>whitewashed<s%> <S%G5109>wall!<s%> And do you <S%G2521>sit<s%> to <S%G2919>try<s%> me <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> and in <S%G3891>violation<s%> of the <S%G3891>Law<s%> <S%G2753>order<s%> me to be <S%G5180>struck<s%>?"
But the <S%G3936>bystanders<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Do you <S%G3058>revile<s%> God's <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%>?"

And <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G5346>said,<s%> "I was not <S%G3609>aware,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> that he was <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest;<s%> for it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> 'You shall not <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G2560>evil<s%> of a <S%G758>ruler<s%> of your <S%G2992>people.<s%>'"

But <S%G1097>perceiving<s%> that <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> were <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> and the <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> [began] <S%G2896>crying<s%> out in the <S%G4892>Council,<s%> <S%G435>"Brethren,<s%> <S%G80><s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> a <S%G5330>Pharisee,<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G5330>Pharisees;<s%> I am on <S%G2919>trial<s%> for the <S%G1680>hope<s%> and <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead!<s%>"

And as he <S%G2980>said<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G4714>dissension<s%> between the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and <S%G4523>Sadducees;<s%> and the <S%G4128>assembly<s%> was <S%G4977>divided.<s%>

For the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> that there is <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G386>resurrection,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> an <S%G32>angel,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit;<s%> but the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3670>acknowledge<s%> them <S%G297>all.<s%>

And there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2906>uproar;<s%> and <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisaic<s%> <S%G3313>party<s%> <S%G450>stood<s%> up and [began] to <S%G1264>argue<s%> <S%G1264>heatedly,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "We <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G2556>wrong<s%> with <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>man;<s%> <S%G1487>suppose<s%> <S%G1161><s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> has <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to him?"

And as a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4714>dissension<s%> was <S%G1096>developing,<s%> the <S%G5506>commander<s%> was <S%G5399>afraid<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> would be <S%G1288>torn<s%> to <S%G1288>pieces<s%> by them and <S%G2753>ordered<s%> the <S%G4753>troops<s%> to <S%G2597>go<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> and <S%G726>take<s%> him <S%G726>away<s%> from them by <S%G726>force,<s%> and <S%G71>bring<s%> him into the <S%G3925>barracks.<s%>

But on the <S%G3571>night<s%> [immediately] <S%G7075>following,<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2186>stood<s%> at his side and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2293>"Take<s%> <S%G2293>courage;<s%> for as you have <S%G1263>solemnly<s%> <S%G1263>witnessed<s%> to My <S%G3588>cause<s%> <S%G4012><s%> at <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> you <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> at <S%G4516>Rome<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>."

And when it was <S%G2250>day,<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4160>formed<s%> a <S%G4160>conspiracy<s%> and <S%G332>bound<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G332>under<s%> an <S%G332>oath,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> that they would <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> they had <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G3972>Paul.<s%>
And there were <S%G4183>more<s%> than <S%G5065>forty<s%> who <S%G4160>formed<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4945>plot.<s%>

And they <S%G4334>came<s%> to the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G4245>elders,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "We have <S%G332>bound<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> <S%G332>under<s%> a <S%G331>solemn<s%> <S%G332>oath<s%> to <S%G1089>taste<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> we have <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G3972>Paul.<s%>

<S%G3568>"Now,<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> you and the <S%G4892>Council<s%> <S%G1718>notify<s%> the <S%G5506>commander<s%> to <S%G2609>bring<s%> him <S%G2609>down<s%> to you, as <S%G5613>though<s%> you were <S%G3195>going<s%> to <S%G1231>determine<s%> his <S%G3588>case<s%> <S%G4012><s%> by a <S%G199>more<s%> <S%G199>thorough<s%> <S%G199>investigation;<s%> and we for our part are <S%G2092>ready<s%> to <S%G337>slay<s%> him <S%G4253>before<s%> he <S%G1448>comes<s%> <S%G1448>near<s%> [the place.]"

But the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G3972>Paul<s%>'s <S%G79>sister<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of their <S%G1747>ambush,<s%> and he <S%G3854>came<s%> and <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G3925>barracks<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> Paul.

And <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1543>centurions<s%> to him and <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G520>"Lead<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3494>young<s%> <S%G3494>man<s%> to the <S%G5506>commander,<s%> for he <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> to <S%G518>report<s%> to him."

<S%G3767>So<s%> he <S%G3880>took<s%> him and <S%G71>led<s%> him to the <S%G5506>commander<s%> and <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G3972>"Paul<s%> the <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> me to him and <S%G2065>asked<s%> me to <S%G71>lead<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3495>young<s%> <S%G3495>man<s%> to you since he <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> to <S%G2980>tell<s%> you."

And the <S%G5506>commander<s%> <S%G1949>took<s%> him by the <S%G5495>hand<s%> and <S%G402>stepping<s%> <S%G402>aside,<s%> [began] to <S%G4441>inquire<s%> of him <S%G2596>privately,<s%> <S%G2398><s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> is it that you <S%G2192>have<s%> to <S%G518>report<s%> to me?"

And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> "The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> have <S%G4934>agreed<s%> to <S%G2065>ask<s%> you to <S%G2609>bring<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2609>down<s%> <S%G839>tomorrow<s%> to the <S%G4892>Council,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> they were <S%G3195>going<s%> to <S%G4441>inquire<s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%> <S%G199>more<s%> <S%G199>thoroughly<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> him.

<S%G3767>"So<s%> do not <S%G3982>listen<s%> to them, for <S%G4183>more<s%> than <S%G5065>forty<s%> of them are <S%G1748>lying<s%> in <S%G1748>wait<s%> for him <S%G3748>who<s%> have <S%G332>bound<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G332>under<s%> a <S%G332>curse<s%> not to <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G3383>or<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> they <S%G337>slay<s%> him; and <S%G3568>now<s%> they are <S%G2092>ready<s%> and <S%G4327>waiting<s%> for the <S%G1860>promise<s%> from you."

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> the <S%G5506>commander<s%> <S%G630>let<s%> the <S%G3495>young<s%> <S%G3495>man<s%> <S%G630>go,<s%> <S%G3853>instructing<s%> him, <S%G1583>"Tell<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one<s%> that you have <S%G1718>notified<s%> me of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>"

And he <S%G4341>called<s%> to him <S%G1417>two<s%> of the <S%G1543>centurions,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2090>"Get<s%> <S%G1250>two<s%> <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G2090>ready<s%> by the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> of the <S%G3571>night<s%> to <S%G4198>proceed<s%> to <S%G2542>Caesarea,<s%> with <S%G1440>seventy<s%> <S%G2460>horsemen<s%> and <S%G1250>two<s%> <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G1187>spearmen.<s%>"

[They were] <S%G5037>also<s%> to <S%G3936>provide<s%> <S%G2934>mounts<s%> to <S%G1913>put<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> on and <S%G1295>bring<s%> him <S%G1295>safely<s%> to <S%G5344>Felix<s%> the <S%G2232>governor.<s%>
And he <S%G1125>wrote<s%> a <S%G1992>letter<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> form: <S%G5179><s%>
<S%G2804>"Claudius<s%> <S%G3079>Lysias,<s%> to the <S%G2903>most<s%> <S%G2903>excellent<s%> <S%G2232>governor<s%> <S%G5344>Felix,<s%> <S%G5463>greetings.<s%>

"When <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> was <S%G4815>arrested<s%> by the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and was <S%G3195>about<s%> to be <S%G337>slain<s%> by them, I <S%G2186>came<s%> upon them with the <S%G4753>troops<s%> and <S%G1807>rescued<s%> him, having <S%G3129>learned<s%> that he was a <S%G4514>Roman.<s%>

"And <S%G1014>wanting<s%> to <S%G1921>ascertain<s%> the <S%G156>charge<s%> for <S%G3739>which<s%> they were <S%G1458>accusing<s%> him, I <S%G2609>brought<s%> him <S%G2609>down<s%> to their <S%G4892>Council;<s%>

and I <S%G2147>found<s%> him to be <S%G1458>accused<s%> <S%G4012>over<s%> <S%G2213>questions<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> their <S%G3551>Law,<s%> but <S%G2192>under<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G1462>accusation<s%> <S%G514>deserving<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1199>imprisonment.<s%>

"And when I was <S%G3377>informed<s%> that there would be a <S%G1917>plot<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G435>man,<s%> I <S%G3992>sent<s%> him to you at <S%G1824>once,<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3853>instructing<s%> his <S%G2725>accusers<s%> to <S%G3004>bring<s%> <S%G3004>charges<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> him <S%G1909>before<s%> you."

<S%G3767>So<s%> the <S%G4757>soldiers,<s%> in <S%G2596>accordance<s%> with their <S%G1299>orders,<s%> <S%G353>took<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G71>brought<s%> him by <S%G3571>night<s%> to <S%G494>Antipatris.<s%>
But the <S%G1887>next<s%> <S%G1887>day,<s%> <S%G1439>leaving<s%> the <S%G2460>horsemen<s%> to <S%G565>go<s%> on with him, they <S%G5290>returned<s%> to the <S%G3925>barracks.<s%>

And when <S%G3748>these<s%> had <S%G1525>come<s%> to <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> and <S%G325>delivered<s%> the <S%G1992>letter<s%> to the <S%G2232>governor,<s%> they <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3936>presented<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> to him.
And when he had <S%G314>read<s%> it, he <S%G1905>asked<s%> from <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1885>province<s%> he was; and when he <S%G4441>learned<s%> that he was from <S%G2791>Cilicia,<s%>

he <S%G5346>said,<s%> "I will <S%G1251>give<s%> you a <S%G1251>hearing<s%> <S%G3752>after<s%> your <S%G2725>accusers<s%> <S%G3854>arrive<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%>" <S%G2753>giving<s%> <S%G2753>orders<s%> for him to be <S%G5442>kept<s%> in Herod's <S%G4232>Praetorium.<s%>
